text: Bevington is a city in Iowa in the United States. The population was 57 at the 2020 census. The Middle River runs alongside Bevington. Madison County contains the majority of the city. The city's total area is 0.46 square miles (1.19 km2), of which 0.45 square miles (1.17 km2) are land and 0.01 square miles (0.03 km2) are water, according to the US Census Bureau. Bevington is situated on State Highway 92, just next to Interstate 35. ==Sources== Category:Cities in Iowa
title: Bevington, Iowa
